dataObjects.name: Comments
dataObjects.description: BCF 3.0 Comment object representing a comment on a topic

guid.description: The globally unique identifier of the comment

date.description: The date when the comment was created

topic_guid.description: The guid of the topic this comment belongs to

viewpoint_guid.description: The guid of the viewpoint this comment references

modified_date.description: The date when the comment was last modified

modified_author.description: The author who last modified the comment

items.description: List of authorized actions for this comment

comment_actions.description: List of authorized actions for this comment

schema.description: BCF 3.0 Comment object representing a comment on a topic

dataObjects.name: Comment
dataObjects.description: BCF 3.0 Comment object representing a single comment

guid.description: The globally unique identifier of the comment

date.description: The date when the comment was created

topic_guid.description: The guid of the topic this comment belongs to

schema.description: BCF 3.0 Comment object representing a single comment

actions.name: Create
actions.description: Creates a new BCF 3.0 comment on a topic

project_id.description: The id of the Trimble Connect Project

topic_id.description: The id of the topic to add the comment to

guid.description: Optional GUID for the comment. If not provided, one will be generated.
The globally unique identifier of the created comment

date.description: The date when the comment was created

topic_guid.description: The guid of the topic this comment belongs to

actions.name: Update
actions.description: Updates a BCF 3.0 comment on a topic

project_id.description: The id of the Trimble Connect Project

topic_id.description: The id of the topic containing the comment

comment_id.description: The id of the comment to update

guid.description: The globally unique identifier of the comment

date.description: The date when the comment was created

topic_guid.description: The guid of the topic this comment belongs to

actions.name: Delete
actions.description: Deletes a BCF 3.0 comment from a topic

project_id.description: The id of the Trimble Connect Project

topic_id.description: The id of the topic containing the comment

comment_id.description: The id of the comment to delete

actions.name: Create
actions.description: Creates a new document reference in a BCF 3.0 topic

project_id.description: The id of the Trimble Connect Project

topic_id.description: The id of the topic to add the document reference to

url.description: The URL to the external document (required for external documents, must be null for internal documents)

document_guid.description: The guid of the internal document (required for internal documents, must be null for external documents)

guid.description: The globally unique identifier of the created document reference

url.description: The URL to the external document

document_guid.description: The guid of the internal document

actions.description: Updates an existing document reference in a BCF 3.0 topic

document_reference_id.description: The id of the document reference to update

document_guid.description: The guid of the internal document (required for internal documents, must be null for external documents)

url.description: The URL to the external document

document_guid.description: The guid of the internal document

actions.name: Delete
actions.description: Deletes an existing document reference in a BCF 3.0 topic
